mapper.select: select mouse_id as id, mouse_name as mouseName, mouse_food as mouseFood, mouse_harm as mouseHarm from t_mouse;

select mouse_id as id, mouse_harm as mouseHarm, mouse_food as mouseFood, mouse_name as mouseName, mouse_breed as mouseBreed, mouse_natural as mouseNatural, mouse_photo as mousePhoto, mouse_prevent as mousePrevent from t_mouse where mouse_id=#{mouseId} ;
mapper.insert: insert into t_mouse(mouse_name, mouse_breed, mouse_food, mouse_natural, mouse_prevent, mouse_photo, mouse_harm) values(#{mouseName},#{mouseBreed},#{mouseFood},#{mouseNatural},#{mousePrevent},#{mousePhoto},#{mouseHarm})
mapper.select: select count(*) from t_mouse where mouse_name=#{mouseName} ;
